message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you 400k, and I'll take 600k. What do you say?
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering you got the better end of the deal last time. Let's see if you accept this offer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 70% is a fairer share, considering the inflation. What do you say?
Inflation is hitting us both, but I think 70/30 is a fair compromise. If we don't agree, we'll both lose more in the next round.
